name: Dundee Precious Metals Inc.
longDescription: Dundee Precious Metals Inc is an international mining company engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development, mining, and processing of precious metals. The company has three reportable operating segments Chelopech and Ada Tepe in Bulgaria and Tsumeb in Namibia.
fulldescription: Dundee Precious Metals Inc is an international mining company engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development, mining, and processing of precious metals. The company has three reportable operating segments Chelopech and Ada Tepe in Bulgaria and Tsumeb in Namibia.
fullAddress: 1 Adelaide Street East,Suite 500, P.O. Box 195, Toronto, ON, CA
